recommendation_service.optimization_model.opt_model

Module Contents

Classes

OptModel

Creates the basic template to calculate an optimization model.
class recommendation_service.optimization_model.opt_model.OptModel(input_data: recommendation_service.data_models.input_model.InputModel, config: recommendation_service.data_models.config_model.ConfigModel)

Creates the basic template to calculate an optimization model.

Parameters:

  • input_data (InputModel) – Input data request containing parametarization values of the optimization model

  • config (ConfigModel) – Content of a configuration file

Raises:

FileNotFoundError – If parameter file not found under path set in config.data_dependencies.parameters

run_calculation(export: bool = False, export_filename: str = None) → recommendation_service.data_models.optimization_results_model.OptimizationResultsModel

Starts the calculation of an optimization model including building of the pyomo model, optimization by solver and building result output.

Parameters:

  • export (bool, optional) – Whether detailed result time series should be exported to an Excel file, by default False

  • export_filename (str, optional) – Path of the Excel file to write detailed results with time series to, by default None

Returns:

Results object which is returned by the service as response

Return type:

OptimizationResultsModel
